content: I see there are often commits like this just to bump up the dependencies - would it be worthwhile to add https://dependabot.com which does this chore automatically?
I think not because generally I need to make the changes as part of a PR
I mean, I wouldn't mind but I can't imagine the workflow if something else was doing that
It just automatically makes a PR for you so all you do is press merge when dependencies update. Try it, it's kind of neat
It does it per-dependency I think so you have a choice of accepting or rejecting a particular version bump
